name: Uczen Czarnoksieznika
overview: Uczeń Czarnoksiężnika (The sorcerer's Apprentice) is a platform game. Your character is about to recover all the pages of The Magic Book and some artefacts like Magic Wand and Magic Hat that belonged to your master sorcerer who died during spell creation. You travel through the sorcerer's castle finding what will grant you the possibility to become a wizard. The game is similar to Dizzy series. You walk through a maze-like castle, collecting objects and spells and using them in proper places.
